title: PCPuppyOS 3.01 rc5
description:
<a href="http://www.pcpuppyos.com/">PCPuppyOS homepage</a>



pcPuppyOS is a derivative of Puppy Linux , a lightweight operating system designed 
to be very useable on older systems - or very useable and very fast on newer ones.  Puppy Linux is a versatile operating system, sharing binary compatibility with Slackware Linux, but is a complete operating system with many enhancements to make it meet its objective of being small, yet powerful.


Some Included Applications


CATEGORY	NAME	DESCRIPTION
Office	Open Office	With Oxygen Extensions! Word Processing, Spreadsheet, Database, Presentation
Network	Citrix Client	Thin Client
 	Cisco VPN	VPN
Security	Scramdisk	Allows the creation and use of virtual encrypted drives.
 	Enigmail	Security extension to Mozilla Thunderbird and Seamonkey.
 	Emcrypt	Device-mapper target that provides transparent encryption of block devices
Internet	Limewire	P2P file sharing
 	Skype	VOIP, chat
 	Firefox	Web Browsing
 	Thunderbird	Email
 	Gaim	Chat
 	Meebo	Chat
 	Gftp	FTP
 	PupCtorrent	Torrent

 	KompoZer	HTML Editor

 	Inkskape	Vector Editor
 	Xsane	Image Scanner
 	OO Draw	Drawing
 	GTKSee	Image Manger
 	ClamAV	Antivirus - Includes auto-updating
Utilities	Linux Firewall	Firewall
